thread.title: Bears DL Jeremiah Ratliff: I'll play Sunday

title: Bears DL Jeremiah Ratliff: I'll play Sunday
text:
Jeremiah Ratliff will make his first start of the season Sunday in Kansas City.
The Bears defensive lineman said Thursday that he’ll play. He suffered an ankle injury in the preseason that did not recover in time for him to play last week, when he was ruled inactive. It was the first game he was eligible to play in after serving a three-game suspension for violating the NFL’s drug and alcohol policy.
“It was a game-time thing,” Ratliff said. “I’ll be up this week. That’s all that matters.”
Ratliff is listed as the team’s starting nose tackle.
Follow me on Twitter @patrickfinley
Email: pfinley@suntimes.com
